definition: Mao Sui recommends himself (idiom); to offer one's services (in the style of Mao Sui offering his services to king of Chu 楚 of the Warring states)

sentences.english: I fully expected one of the women to volunteer6, as was usually the case.
sentences.chinese: 我满心指望像平常一样，某位女士能毛遂自荐。

sentences.english: Do you shrink from doing anything that smacks of self-promotion?
sentences.chinese: 带有自荐意味的事情会让你退缩吗？

sentences.english: He offers up his services to finish the operation.
sentences.chinese: 他毛遂自荐来完成这个行动计划。

sentences.english: Applicants whose personal statements are submitted in both Korean and English receive precedent.
sentences.chinese: 曾有申请学生递交过韩英双语之自荐个人陈述的先例。

sentences.english: Thank you to take time to browse me to recommend letter in 100 favours first.
sentences.chinese: 起首感激您在百忙之中抽暇阅读本人地自荐信。

sentences.english: Ask if you can help be a source for other stories.
sentences.chinese: 如果其它报道你能提供新闻线索，不妨自荐。

sentences.english: Li Yugang proposed to the boss that he could finish the show for her.
sentences.chinese: 李玉刚向他的老板自荐说他可以完成女声部分。

sentences.english: Thank you for opening up the introductory letter which read me in the midst of pressing affairs.
sentences.chinese: 感谢您在百忙之中展阅我的自荐信。

sentences.english: Extremely thank you in to be very busy can scrutinize me to offer to volunteer the book.
sentences.chinese: 十分感激您在百忙中能核阅本人的自荐书。

sentences.english: Finally, thank you to scrutinize me once more to offer to volunteer the material.
sentences.chinese: 最后，再次感激您核阅本人的自荐资料。

sentences.english: A cover letter typically accompanies each resume you send out.
sentences.chinese: 每封自荐信都是随着简历一起寄出的。

sentences.english: We have the pleasure of introducing ourselves to your as a state-operated corporation dealing exclusively in light industrial goods.
sentences.chinese: 我们有幸自荐，我们是一家专营轻工业品的有限公司。

sentences.english: Thank you in 100 favours the exhibition read I recommend the letter.
sentences.chinese: 感谢您在百忙之中展阅我的自荐信。
采用标准的自荐信格式。

sentences.english: It is unadvisable to put yourself up for the chairman's seat.
sentences.chinese: 你自荐当选主席是不明智的。

sentences.english: This might have been established because of the excellence of your CV and covering letter.
sentences.chinese: 对方可能是根据你的简历及自荐书确定你的能力。

definition: Mao Sui recommends himself (idiom); to offer one's services (in the style of Mao Sui offering his services to king of Chu 楚 of the Warring states)
to apply (for a job)/to reply to a job advertisement
to sign up/to enter one's name/to apply/to register/to enroll/to enlist
to be a candidate in an election or other selection process/to run for office/to turn out to vote
to recommend sb/to give a referral
to lobby/to campaign/to promote (an idea, a product)/(old) to visit various rulers and promote one's political ideas (in the Warring States period)
to hire (an employee)/to accept (a manuscript) for publication
